metadata.title: CVE-2021-34055 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
jhead 3.06 is vulnerable to Buffer Overflow via exif.c in function Put16u.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-34055` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

jhead - 1:3.00-4+deb9u1ubuntu0.1~esm2
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: jhead package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:3.00-4+deb9u1ubuntu0.1~esm2').
